translation.headphones_disconnected: Connect headphones to display their battery level and adjust settings
translation.settings_hotkey_anc_description: Press <Key1/> + <Key2/> to switch between noise cancelling modes
translation.settings_fix_disconnects_description: Fixes the problem of endless connect/disconnect headphones
translation.notif_error_websocket_connection_issue: Error! Open the plugin for more info
translation.faq_tip1_header: What can MagicPods for Steam Deck?
translation.faq_tip1_description: Display the battery level and toggle the noise cancellation mode (if supported by the headphones).
translation.faq_tip2_description: AirPods 1-2, AirPods Pro 1-2, AirPods 3, AirPods Max, Beats Fit Pro and possibly other Beats models. Please message in <lnk>Discord</lnk> if your Beats work.
translation.faq_tip3_description: Pair the headphones in the Steam Deck Bluetooth settings. They will automatically appear in MagicPods on the headphones icon tab.
translation.faq_tip4_header: How can I check the battery level?
translation.faq_tip4_description: Connect the headphones and navigate to the charging icon tab.
translation.faq_tip5_header: How can I switch the noise cancellation mode?
translation.faq_tip5_description: Connect the headphones and navigate to the charging icon tab. Use the noise cancellation slider to switch between modes.
translation.faq_tip6_header: How can a new feature be proposed?
translation.faq_tip6_description: Join our <lnk>Discord</lnk> community to discuss new features and learn more about the MagicPods.
translation.faq_tip7_header: How can I report an error?
translation.faq_tip8_header: How can I check the battery level of the case?
translation.faq_tip8_description: Connect the headphones and place at least one AirPod in the open case. Navigate to the charging icon tab, and after a few seconds, the case charge level will appear.
